item.title: Basics of NLP
item.description: Corgies doing NLP - Medieval Fresco. 2022. Roman x Stable Diffusion This session introduces basic concepts of NLP. We will take a Problem-Based-Learning approach and I will introduce NLP-related concepts as we go. If you need a more theoretical intro (standalone), I’ll uploaded pre-recorded videos. We will start with a project based on Context This assignment is based on data from this paper Davidson, T., Warmsley, D., Macy, M., & Weber, I.

item.title: NLP - Other areas
